2025.title: LlamaFirewall
2025.description: LlamaFirewall is an open-source guardrail framework introduced in mid-2025 to mitigate security risks from AI agents—guarding prompt injection, misalignment, insecure code output, and jailbreaks.

2025.title: GoSearch
2025.description: GoSearch is an open-source OSINT tool for mapping digital footprints and usernames, gaining traction in early 2025 for threat hunting workflows.

2025.title: Kunai
2025.description: Kunai is a Linux-focused open-source threat hunting tool providing detailed kernel-level and event monitoring introduced in February 2025.

2025.title: Misconfig Mapper
2025.description: Misconfig Mapper is a Golang CLI tool for identifying cloud and service misconfigurations, gaining in popularity through early 2025.

2025.title: BadDNS
2025.description: BadDNS is a Python-based domain/subdomain takeover scanner that continued adoption into 2025, helping security teams detect takeover risks.

2025.title: OSV-Scanner / OSV-Scalibr
2025.description: Google’s open-source OSV-Scanner (and OSV-Scalibr) received a major update in early 2025 to extract dependency manifests and binary artifacts for more accurate vulnerability scanning.

2025.title: SpecterAI
2025.description: SpecterAI is an AI-driven adversarial simulation toolkit launched in mid-2025, designed to emulate red-team tactics using large language models to test defensive AI systems.

2025.title: RustDefend
2025.description: RustDefend is a modern vulnerability scanner built in Rust, focusing on high-performance binary analysis and memory safety flaw detection across compiled software.

2025.title: EchoProbe
2025.description: EchoProbe is an acoustic side-channel research framework published in 2025, allowing researchers to replicate and analyze sound-based data exfiltration techniques.

2025.title: AstraAudit
2025.description: AstraAudit is a cloud compliance and vulnerability auditing platform that automates scanning for misconfigurations, policy violations, and runtime drifts in Kubernetes clusters.

2025.title: ChainSentinel
2025.description: ChainSentinel is an open-source blockchain security monitor launched in 2025 that detects anomalous transactions, rug-pull patterns, and smart contract exploits in real time.

2025.title: PhantomTrace
2025.description: PhantomTrace is a cross-platform forensic utility released in 2025 for reconstructing deleted or tampered digital evidence from memory and unallocated disk sectors.

2025.title: LynxRecon
2025.description: LynxRecon is an open-source recon automation suite that integrates Shodan, Censys, and FOFA APIs, introduced in early 2025 for enterprise-scale asset discovery.

2025.title: PromptShield
2025.description: PromptShield is a lightweight middleware released in 2025 that filters, classifies, and sanitizes user prompts to prevent LLM injection and indirect prompt attacks.

2025.title: NeuraHunt
2025.description: NeuraHunt is an AI-powered malware analysis engine that uses transformer models to detect polymorphic malware and unpack encrypted payloads in real-time.
